function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Cross-border movement of academics and professionals leading to potential spread of contagious diseases","Impact":"Global spread of diseases, potential for pandemics","Mitigation":"Enforcement of travel restrictions, mandatory quarantine, and health screenings","Technologies":"Biometric identification, temperature screening, contact tracing apps","People":"International travelers, academics, professionals","Owner":"Government, international health organizations"},{"Description":"Financial interventions leading to economic instability and inequality","Impact":"Market instability, financial crises, inequality in access to resources","Mitigation":"Transparent and equitable distribution of financial aid, regulations on market speculation","Technologies":"Blockchain for transparent tracking, AI for financial risk analysis","People":"Economically disadvantaged, small businesses, investors","Owner":"Government, financial regulators"},{"Description":"Lack of timely and accurate information leading to misinformation and panic","Impact":"Widespread panic, hoarding of essential supplies, distrust in authorities","Mitigation":"Efficient communication of accurate information, public health education, combating misinformation online","Technologies":"Social media monitoring tools, data analytics for trend analysis, crisis communication platforms","People":"General public, vulnerable populations, healthcare workers","Owner":"Public health authorities, media organizations"}]}
